name: CRYSTORLD
description:
Get Crystal！

The goal of this game is to get a crystal somewhere on the stage using jumps and dashes.
More than 120 stages!
There are two modes: normal and hard.
Multiplayer for up to 4 people!



[xbox one Controlls]
■title screen
Left stick … cursor move
Left stick … Change stage difficulty or number of players or options
A … Decision
X … skipped in units of 10 (while hold down)

■Game screen
Left stick … Move
Right stick … Camera rotation
A … Jump
X … Dash (while moving)
Y … Pick up (while picking up other players is throw)
Start … Open menu
Select … Hint
R … Reset camera
L … Camera zoom
B + Y… self-destruct and return to previous position
B + Y + A… self-destruct and return to start position

■Menu screen
Left stick … cursor move
A … Decision

[keyboard]
wasd … move
cursor … camera rotate
q … camera zoom
e … camera reset
c … hint
x … menu
v … pick up
space … jump/decision
left shift … dash
